title: Nuclear fusion will not be regulated the same way nuclear fission is — a big win for the fusion industry
description: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission, the nation's top nuclear watchdog, has decided nuclear fusion will not be regulated the way nuclear fission reactors are.

title: Read the internal memo Alphabet sent in merging A.I.-focused groups DeepMind and Google Brain
description: Google is merging two previously separate teams as it races to advance artificial intelligence.

title: Inside Kendall Roy's $29 million NYC 'Succession' apartment: We went to 'great lengths to create something truly unique'
description: The three-level apartment is located in New York City's coveted Upper East Side neighborhood.

title: Ford F-150 Lightning fire footage highlights a growing EV risk
description: Fires involving EV batteries can burn hotter and longer and require new techniques to extinguish, posing a growing challenge to first responders.

title: BuzzFeed will lay off 15% of staff, shutter its news unit
description: BuzzFeed will lay off 15% of staff and will shut down its news unit, BuzzFeed CEO Jonah Peretti wrote in an email to staff Thursday.

title: What Bard said when Google VC asked the A.I. about the value of corporate diversity
description: Artificial intelligence has been prone to generating offensive speech, but a top Google VC says its Bard AI chatbot nailed a question on corporate diversity.

title: Taylor Swift sidestepped FTX lawsuit by asking a simple question—investors can use the same strategy to avoid potential scams
description: Taylor Swift’s apparent due diligence may have helped her avoid getting caught in the legal fallout following the collapse of failed crypto exchange FTX.

title: Nokia shares tank after it misses quarterly profit estimates
description: Finnish telecoms giant Nokia on Thursday posted quarterly operating profit that fell short of market expectations.

title: EU lawmakers approve world's first comprehensive framework for crypto regulation
description: The parliamentary blessing paves the way for MiCA to become law in 2024, putting the EU a step ahead of the U.S. and U.K.

title: Veteran investor David Roche says a credit crunch is coming for 'small-town America'
description: The banking turmoil of March, when several U.S. lenders collapsed, will lead to a credit crunch for "small-town America," veteran strategist David Roche says.

title: Ikea to invest over $2.2 billion in new U.S. store models, pickup locations in next three years
description: Ikea is investing billions in its omnichannel growth strategy in the U.S., marking its biggest investment push since it opened in the U.S. nearly 40 years ago.

title: Michael Schumacher's family taking legal action over A.I. interview
description: Schumacher suffered a brain injury in a skiing accident in December 2013, and his family have guarded his privacy since with updates on his recovery kept to a minimum.

title: China’s central bank expects ‘U-shaped’ recovery in consumer prices
description: The People's Bank of China said it's not expecting inflation or deflation to become a significant problem for China.

title: UK inflation is just not going down as cost of living crisis offers 'no respite'
description: U.K. inflation remained stubbornly in double digits in March, driven largely by soaring food prices, as the country's cost-of-living crisis showed little sign of abating.

title: Ukraine’s corn and wheat exports are set to plummet. Here’s what that means for the world's food supply
description: Restrictions on grain exports from Ukraine caused food prices to rise, but the global picture is much more complex.

title: Overwhelming majority of Gen Z workers would quit their jobs over company values, LinkedIn data says
description: Company values are increasingly important to employees, and can be deciding factors for those considering quitting or choosing a new job, LinkedIn says.

title: Toyota reveals two more electric cars for China
description: Toyota this week began taking orders for its first electric sedan in China, and announced two more models are set to come to the local market next year.

title: Sugar prices spike to 11-year high and could rise further due to extreme weather
description: Prices have been driven up by unseasonal rainfall in India, a poor European beat crop and summer drought conditions.

title: Apple bets big on India, but will still rely on China for 'years' to come
description: For years, Tim Cook has been bullish on India. Now, he is betting on the Asian giant as it diversifies from China as Apple expands its India footprint.
